title: Cant post or comment on boards. Im lvl 11................
body: I think the boards need to update, I cant post or comment on boards and im lvl 11. I would love a fix for this.

replies.body: Looks like you just needed to have your boards profile synced up with your Summoner level, which making this post did the trick!

When you post for the first time, it will sync with your current information. If you reached level 30 but haven't posted since level 11, you'd still appear as level 11 until you posted. After which, it'd update to 30.
